content:
TASK: Craft an item of type: diamond_axe
inventory=[{"type": "packed_ice", "quantity": 48, "index": 14}, {"type": "warped_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 21}, {"type": "weeping_vines", "quantity": 31, "index": 23}, {"type": "polished_blackstone", "quantity": 2, "index": 31}, {"type": "stripped_birch_wood", "quantity": 1, "index": 32}, {"type": "prismarine_slab", "quantity": 59, "index": 33}, {"type": "detector_rail", "quantity": 16, "index": 34}, {"type": "brown_terracotta", "quantity": 27, "index": 36}, {"type": "jigsaw", "quantity": 45, "index": 37}, {"type": "wooden_axe", "quantity": 1, "index": 38}, {"type": "diamond", "quantity": 3, "index": 42}]

thought: To craft a diamond_axe, I need to craft a stick and then place a diamond above it. To craft a stick, I need to craft birch_planks, which can be obtained from stripped_birch_wood. I will move the stripped_birch_wood from slot 32 to slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 32 to slot 1 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: diamond_axe
inventory=[{"type": "birch_planks", "quantity": 4, "index": 0}, {"type": "stripped_birch_wood", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "packed_ice", "quantity": 48, "index": 14}, {"type": "warped_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 21}, {"type": "weeping_vines", "quantity": 31, "index": 23}, {"type": "polished_blackstone", "quantity": 2, "index": 31}, {"type": "prismarine_slab", "quantity": 59, "index": 33}, {"type": "detector_rail", "quantity": 16, "index": 34}, {"type": "brown_terracotta", "quantity": 27, "index": 36}, {"type": "jigsaw", "quantity": 45, "index": 37}, {"type": "wooden_axe", "quantity": 1, "index": 38}, {"type": "diamond", "quantity": 3, "index": 42}]
thought: After crafting birch_planks, I need to move them to an empty slot so that I can craft sticks. I will move all 4 birch_planks from slot 0 to slot 11.
Ok
act: move from slot 0 to slot 11 with quantity 4

TASK: Craft an item of type: diamond_axe
inventory=[{"type": "birch_planks", "quantity": 4, "index": 11}, {"type": "packed_ice", "quantity": 48, "index": 14}, {"type": "warped_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 21}, {"type": "weeping_vines", "quantity": 31, "index": 23}, {"type": "polished_blackstone", "quantity": 2, "index": 31}, {"type": "prismarine_slab", "quantity": 59, "index": 33}, {"type": "detector_rail", "quantity": 16, "index": 34}, {"type": "brown_terracotta", "quantity": 27, "index": 36}, {"type": "jigsaw", "quantity": 45, "index": 37}, {"type": "wooden_axe", "quantity": 1, "index": 38}, {"type": "diamond", "quantity": 3, "index": 42}]

thought: I want to craft a diamond axe, but I don't have sticks. So I will first craft a stick. To do so, I need to place some wooden planks in the crafting table. I will move one birch plank from slot 11 to slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 11 to slot 1 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: diamond_axe
inventory=[{"type": "birch_button", "quantity": 1, "index": 0}, {"type": "birch_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "birch_planks", "quantity": 3, "index": 11}, {"type": "packed_ice", "quantity": 48, "index": 14}, {"type": "warped_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 21}, {"type": "weeping_vines", "quantity": 31, "index": 23}, {"type": "polished_blackstone", "quantity": 2, "index": 31}, {"type": "prismarine_slab", "quantity": 59, "index": 33}, {"type": "detector_rail", "quantity": 16, "index": 34}, {"type": "brown_terracotta", "quantity": 27, "index": 36}, {"type": "jigsaw", "quantity": 45, "index": 37}, {"type": "wooden_axe", "quantity": 1, "index": 38}, {"type": "diamond", "quantity": 3, "index": 42}]
thought: I have already placed one birch plank in the crafting table. I will now move another birch plank from slot 11 to slot 4, which is below slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 11 to slot 4 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: diamond_axe
inventory=[{"type": "stick", "quantity": 4, "index": 0}, {"type": "birch_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "birch_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 4}, {"type": "birch_planks", "quantity": 2, "index": 11}, {"type": "packed_ice", "quantity": 48, "index": 14}, {"type": "warped_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 21}, {"type": "weeping_vines", "quantity": 31, "index": 23}, {"type": "polished_blackstone", "quantity": 2, "index": 31}, {"type": "prismarine_slab", "quantity": 59, "index": 33}, {"type": "detector_rail", "quantity": 16, "index": 34}, {"type": "brown_terracotta", "quantity": 27, "index": 36}, {"type": "jigsaw", "quantity": 45, "index": 37}, {"type": "wooden_axe", "quantity": 1, "index": 38}, {"type": "diamond", "quantity": 3, "index": 42}]
thought: Now I can craft the sticks. I will move them from the crafting table to slot 12.
Ok
act: move from slot 0 to slot 12 with quantity 4

TASK: Craft an item of type: diamond_axe
inventory=[{"type": "birch_planks", "quantity": 2, "index": 11}, {"type": "stick", "quantity": 4, "index": 12}, {"type": "packed_ice", "quantity": 48, "index": 14}, {"type": "warped_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 21}, {"type": "weeping_vines", "quantity": 31, "index": 23}, {"type": "polished_blackstone", "quantity": 2, "index": 31}, {"type": "prismarine_slab", "quantity": 59, "index": 33}, {"type": "detector_rail", "quantity": 16, "index": 34}, {"type": "brown_terracotta", "quantity": 27, "index": 36}, {"type": "jigsaw", "quantity": 45, "index": 37}, {"type": "wooden_axe", "quantity": 1, "index": 38}, {"type": "diamond", "quantity": 3, "index": 42}]
thought: The first step in crafting a diamond_axe is to move one of the three diamonds from slot 42 to slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 42 to slot 1 with quantity 1

inventory=[{"type": "diamond", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "birch_planks", "quantity": 2, "index": 11}, {"type": "stick", "quantity": 4, "index": 12}, {"type": "packed_ice", "quantity": 48, "index": 14}, {"type": "warped_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 21}, {"type": "weeping_vines", "quantity": 31, "index": 23}, {"type": "polished_blackstone", "quantity": 2, "index": 31}, {"type": "prismarine_slab", "quantity": 59, "index": 33}, {"type": "detector_rail", "quantity": 16, "index": 34}, {"type": "brown_terracotta", "quantity": 27, "index": 36}, {"type": "jigsaw", "quantity": 45, "index": 37}, {"type": "wooden_axe", "quantity": 1, "index": 38}, {"type": "diamond", "quantity": 2, "index": 42}]
